website_summaries.verdict: These fruit snacks have a very smooth flavor and deliver vitamin C, even though they also are made with extra sugar.
pros: Includes sweet potato concentrate along with fruit juice concentrates
A good snack for both kids and adults
cons: The first ingredients are corn syrup and sugar, not fruit

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A) delicious. B) a box of 40 packets is bigger than I had remembered (which was hilarious when I opened up the shipping box and literally half of it was this, with the other three things I ordered at the same time sadly tucked in the other side). C) if you're buying them just for yourself (...what), consider not keeping them within easy reach, because I guarantee you'll eat too many and start wondering why you're like this. 10/10 would buy again. And maybe attempt better self-control...
customer_reviews.author: Inoru

customer_reviews.title: Missing bags/ debri in retaped box
customer_reviews.text: Came in a retaped box that had gravel looking pieces attached to it. There were additional gravel looking pieces inside the box. There were 3 missing bags.
customer_reviews.author: J. Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive yummy toddler snack
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old can be a picky/moody eater, but she always wants these! They are useful As an incentive to get her to eat her fruits/veggies & these are her dessert! She’s always walking around saying, “snack!” I like that 40 come in a box so they last a while & for less than $6.00 you can’t really beat it. I was constantly buying other “baby snacks” that were so expensive & barely had any food in the package. These are so much better, as it is more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Laww89

customer_reviews.title: All Natural, Smooth Flavor, Less Tart & Bigger Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: These snacks are great when I get a sweet tooth and I want to pretend I'm getting plenty of fruits and veggies. Compared to Welch's Fruit Snacks, these are better tasting, unless you like the tartness of Welch's. I'm not into sour or tart, and the Mott's are a very smooth fruit flavor. And the best part is this is a 40 pack box instead of the average 8-12 snacks from others. All around, these are the best tasting and the best value. The 10 pack Motts in Prime Pantry are 3.63. This 40 pack is only 5.88 as of today. Go for the family size to get the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: SoggyNacho

customer_reviews.title: A hit for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: My trick or treaters loved these! I had a little game where they threw a fake spider into a plastic cauldron for prizes. I offered them the choice of these fruit snacks, Halloween themed rubber stampers, or erasers, and the fruit snacks ran out first. The only reason I gave them 4 stars was because the packages weren’t labeled with ingredients. I was hoping that the brand was well known enough that any moms with questions could go on the internet and look up what they needed to know. Will buy again next year if this size is available (40 pk).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Gifts from MeMaw!
customer_reviews.text: I love to send my grandchildren just a small little something to let them know that wherever MeMaw is (we move a lot being in the military so I don't get to see them all of the time as I used to😔) she is always thinking about them. These are perfect for that. I also send them larger gifts via Amazon less frequently, but these are great to send frequently so they know how important they are!!!💝💝💝
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Dani Wasiak

customer_reviews.title: Good & recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in very good condition. I counted the pouches to make sure it's 40 and it was sure complete. Each pouch has seven to 9 fruity gummies. Tastes good. Natural flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: My family enjoys Welch's fruit snacks, but I was interested in trying another flavor. The Mott's snacks are gooey and not very flavorful. They also stick to your teeth. I felt like I'd been sold a box of Jujyfruits. Do also be aware that there is less for your money here as well. The Welch's packs are .9 ounces, but these are .8 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. TorregrossaTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Good but too sticky .. stick to your teeth incredibly bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste, super sticky on your teeth
customer_reviews.text: Taste bad, sticks to your teeth. Better off eating bad taffee
customer_reviews.author: Brhett F.

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I bought 2 boxes for my kids and not one of them liked these snacks. Decided to try a little pouch myself and they don't taste very good. What's even worse is the consistency of the fruit snack. It is very chewy and very sticky, they immediately get stuck on your teeth and it's hard to take off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JUJU

customer_reviews.title: Too Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give these a try after staying away from them for years. I was disappointed. They were extremely gooey and stuck to my kid's teeth. If you like ooey, gooey, then these are for you. Not a fan ....kids not a fan.... :( Had to discard, even the neighbors knew about these and their kids too! So I could not pay if forward. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Made with GMOs
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a healthy snack but they are not.Sugar heavy,The worst thing is genetic engineering which was not posted in the description on Amazon.I would not have ordered them and they are not returnable.Only good for the trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Harvey😅

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I know normally, "loaded with sugar" is not a good statement or concept to make in general, however, its cheaper for me as a diabetic to buy and carry these in my purse or coat pocket, than expensive glucose tablets. The sugar starts metabolizing almost as quickly as standard glucose tablets too.. .and just one or two pouches is enough to bring my glucose up to a normal number in those instances where I've over-exerted myself or perhaps underestimated calories in a regular meal. And having a few packs in your pocket on any given day when you might see your grandchildren, is a persuasive way to get them smiling too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy these at the store and they taste good, but these tasted horrible. My son who usually love these threw his away. There was something not right with these. I will just buy them the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh fruit taste!
customer_reviews.text: I started my search for the perfect gummy after falling in love with the taste of gummy vitamins. I tried almost every gummy out there and they were fine, but they didn't have the same real-fruit flavor that my once-a-days have. On a whim, I bought a box of these and behold, that fresh fruit taste I've been searching for! These are a little stickier/softer than regular gummies with a more authentic flavor than the other gummies out there. They're quite delicious and if you're looking for that perfect gummy vitamin taste, this is where you'll find it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Snack Addiction
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands favorite guilty pleasure. Only be doesn’t feel guilty about it. I wake up to our trash can littered with empty little Mott fruit snack wrappers. He stops at the grocery store on the way home to buy the tiny boxes and has a mental map of where they are stocked in town. I have the large box on subscription from Amazon, but it only lasts a week. I think he needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky & GMO
customer_reviews.text: So I liked that it doesn't use dyes which is why I decided to try it. However, I missed the part that it is partially GMO. I took a small bite from one and it wins as the stickiest gummy of all the brands we've tried (e.g. Hasbro, Albanese, Black forest, Annie's). Even my 7 year old said she doesn't want another pack. She said "mama, I had to brush my teeth right away because it is so sticky". Yes yes, we are well aware gummies are supposed to be sticky but this one is out of this world. I don't recommend esp for kids who may not be brushing well yet.
customer_reviews.author: JustPeachy

customer_reviews.title: Gooey, slimey texture, and they don't taste all that great
customer_reviews.text: Many people seem to like these fruit snacks. I have tried 3 other brands: Welches (very good), Kellogg's (very good), and "Black Forest" (very good and tasty). This brand is very gooey and sticks to my teeth, which the other three brands never did. As I'm chewing, it feels slimey. Plus, they don't taste all that great. If you think these are great, maybe you haven't tried the others.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdGen

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit snack!
customer_reviews.text: Mott’s fruit snacks come in a good size bag with approximately 16 pieces of fruit snack per bag. Very tasty. A nice after school snack or snack to put in school lunch. Gluten-free & full of Vitamin C. I think one of the best fruit snacks on the market. For a box of 40 the price is great. A nicely packaged box with each snack bag being an easy open. In taking advantage of Subscribe & Save it’s convenient to order any given month you need a new box plus there’s additional $ savings. Definitely a fruit snack I like my Son to have. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Sugar Bombs
customer_reviews.text: I think Mott’s has redefined the word “fruit” with these snacks. These are tasty little sugar bombs. I can literally feel my blood sugar spike after only one pack and I’m not a small woman. These must send kids into the stratosphere. The taste is sweet rather than sour fruit. The texture is soft and gummy. The scent is fruity. The snack pack packaging is not easy tear but pull wide to open. The portion sizes seem appropriate per pack and keep me from mindlessly chowing down a pound in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Too gooey
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get past the gooey texture. Gave them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Mellies

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: These gummies taste really good. I've tried other ones like the Scooby-Doo and the all-natural and I always come back to this one. I also keep a couple of these in my purse and in my car so that if someone needs a little burst of sugar I have it available to me. You could probably use it for soccer snacks and snacks that you send to the school with your kindergarteners . It's close to the Welch's but Welch's i more expensive per item good. I keep some and my snack box for when my grand children come over. Great item for the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R. Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, go Welch's.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, the sunkist or better yet welch's brand are far better. I guess you get what you pay for, cause these have a very odd chemical taste and an unpleasant texture.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A Healthier Delicious Snack
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to at least eat the least harmful sugary candies, I opted for these. They taste REALLY good. They are very soft and kind of melt in my mouth if I allow them to long enough. So I feel better knowing that these have real fruit and vegetables in them. However, instead of eating one little bag, I eat 3-4 at a time, so I’m really not fooling myself. Well, anyway, I figure the sooner I eat them, the sooner they will be gone, and I can be REALLY GOOD and go on a Keto diet. Unless I give in and buy more Motts!
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A) delicious. B) a box of 40 packets is bigger than I had remembered (which was hilarious when I opened up the shipping box and literally half of it was this, with the other three things I ordered at the same time sadly tucked in the other side). C) if you're buying them just for yourself (...what), consider not keeping them within easy reach, because I guarantee you'll eat too many and start wondering why you're like this.
customer_reviews.author: Wildtek

customer_reviews.title: it's good but it's not fruit only
customer_reviews.text: this may be my mistake because i had clicked a link that said like real serving of fruit with no additives but this one, while having real fruit concentrate stuff in it, has added other stuff. it might be my fault for not reading it correctly. the price is great for 40 packs though and the product itself is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Whang

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 40 count box of fruit snacks. We go through fruit snacks like crazy in our house and I was surprised at how cheap they were on Amazon. I am a coupon shopper and even with using coupons in the store, you still can't get a deal like this! We love the Mott's fruit snacks because they aren't the "character packages" My son is 11 and really isn't into the characters anymore but he still likes eating fruit snacks. He is a Type 1 Diabetic and we need to keep fruit snacks on hand for when his sugar runs low. I will definitely keep purchasing this size box from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Corn syrup candy snacks
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this "veggies" and "all natural" fruit snacks labeling is quite misleading to the buyer. These are 99 percent corn syrup. Its candy. I wasn't sure what I expected, I guess I thought there would be fruit as the primary sweetener. I ordered in a hurry, I should have paid more attention. However, I still think this is misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting, tastes like medicine and sticks to your teeth
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, I am SO DISAPPOINTED. These are disgusting. All of the gummies taste like medicine and the texture isn't chewy, it's sticky. I wish I didn't waste money on this. Now I'm just stuck with a large box of medicine-flavored crap that sticks to your teeth. Even vitamin gummies are WAY better than this. Not exaggerating.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The best fruit snacks!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Motts fruit snacks and I was so pleased to see them on Amazon for a wallet friendly price and the amount of pouches per box is definitely worth it. I keep them in my desk drawer and they are great not too sweet snack. They taste great and I love the different flavors. A great snack for all ages and I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: OK this is a nice product and it's perfect for kids - you might possibly find there are not enough in a package for an adult snack though I feel it is packing heavy .... there are packets for just 6 chews. also calorie wise its a lot for a lady like myself - 45 calories for each pack is the same as 6 jelly beans.
customer_reviews.author: Anjel

customer_reviews.title: Love this healthier snack
customer_reviews.text: Because I’m not going to eat any thing which uses bugs as coloring, red #40, and I have to eat things that are Kosher do to my faith, it is hard to found a gummy product that fits the bill. While this does and I have shared with those in my faith all over the our nation. Draw back: now it seems the pynare always out and the price went up. What gives!!! Brin*the price back down please!!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Real Fruit Snacks
customer_reviews.text: These fruit snacks taste more like fruit than sugar. Perfect for children and adults. I expected them to be extremely sweet, but they are just as described. There's between 8 and 13 a pack if I remember correctly. We ate them so quickly. My 4 year old loves them and shares with his older siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: Best non gelatin gummies
customer_reviews.text: My kids are on a strict halal diet , and they always want to take part in eating gummies with their friends but couldn’t due to the gelatin in most gummies . I Was so delighted when I came across these on amazon . They are fantastic and my kids loves them sooooo much . They taste wonderful and right portions for kids . Best gummies ever !
customer_reviews.author: judai

customer_reviews.title: My kids favorite
customer_reviews.text: Even though I think these have a very small amount of snacks in a package and no one would be satisfied with just one, my kids enjoy eating 2 or 3 packages at a time. I am pretty picky about what my kids eat, but sometimes you need something quick and tasty and these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: steveme4ever

customer_reviews.title: Trick or Treat
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving these out for several years at Halloween. They are soft enough for little kids and don't have peanuts or chocolate for anybody with allergies. I myself love the flavor and usually have some at home. Flavor is good and they stay nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Plahn

customer_reviews.title: crumbs, and broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: There was not much selection as advertised. The items were broken, crumbled, and smashed. The only thing we could do is give the whole mess to the birds, or dump it in the trash. Certainly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freshest gummies
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are THE BEST. The extra you pay compared to Walmart brand gummies is for the freshness. Other gummies are kind of stiff & dry. These are perfect. My only qualm is that carrots are a vegetable not a fruit. Either way the carrot shaped gummies are just as fruity delicious as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Shiv

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer and happy kids!
customer_reviews.text: I loves these Motts! They’re soo good, and the fact that it’s listed at a reasonable and in store price is what caught my eyes. You won’t be disappointed with this purchase. There was no candy missing from the box. The item was stored correctly and not old, as were my concerns. This was definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, taste and price
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these gummies for quite a whilevnow and love them. They are gl the perfect size packs to stick in my back or fanny pack on a bike ride and other physical activities as a quick source of sugar for energy. And then you get vitamins too 😁
customer_reviews.author: Karulin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient alternative snack food for the kids
customer_reviews.text: These are really fresh and a good addition to my family's scheduled subscribe and save order. A tasty snack for the kids, in a convenient package. They're not as nutritional as my usual island fresh fruit leather, but my kids are getting a variety of fruit options during the Covid-19 pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: CYCOLOGISTTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Awful! So sticky!!
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible! You cannot even chew them. They are sooooo sticky it is a project trying to eat just one. I have to throw the whole box out. Awful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good value, okay flavor, very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I like to eat these on the bike or when i want a little sugar. The downside is they stick to your teeth and you need water or something to dislodge them. Other fruit snacks do not have this downside, but the whole box is pretty cheap, so i can't really complain
customer_reviews.author: Torin McFarland

customer_reviews.title: If you get a good price go for it. Plan for only two to three month out on the best by date to be safe.
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price with subscribe and save discount and a coupon. Delivered to my door and the kids love them. They were a little short dated mostly due to the amount but I do not foresee us having a issue with the way the boys eat everything. Bottom Line: Good buy as long as you can score a good price. The price does fluctuate a good bit. Also expect to use most subscribe and save bulk items off Amazon in two to three months just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: WLC101

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some fruit snacks and I got some fruit snacks! not much more to it. It tastes the same as in-store ones but I do believe the box was smaller than the ones we have gotten in-store but I don't collect them so that isn't an issue. Also cheaper on here with plenty to share, though maybe I'll do that when I can safely meet people again!
customer_reviews.author: Moe K.

customer_reviews.title: Stickier/Chewier than expected
customer_reviews.text: First off, to anyone who has braces, I would advise against these. For the rest of us, just understand that these are the type of texture that as soon as you take a bite, they are rather sticky on the inside, hence why I use the braces as an example. If you like that kind of chewy/gum-like style to your fruit chews though, you will like these. I simply don't.
customer_reviews.author: Tuo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible texture.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty terrible.... the flavor is ok but the texture is NOT! And it’s a whole box I gave to my housekeeper for her kids. They probably won’t like them either. They are a weird texture and not gummy bear type. Like mushy and sticky. My kids wouldn’t eat them.
customer_reviews.author: shalom Lombo

customer_reviews.title: Crushed boxes
customer_reviews.text: Good afternoon, I bought four packages of this product to give it away and 2 of the boxes came postponed. In that sense I demand the return of money from two of the packages of the four purchased and the return of the product as compensation for this action.
customer_reviews.author: MANUEL ROJAS

customer_reviews.title: Sticky!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these fruit snacks because the Welches that I normally order in my subscribe and save was out of stock. We are disappointed with the quality of these. They are sticky, sticking to each other and to teeth. The flavor is just okay, definitely not a favorite in our house. Won’t be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly packed box!!
customer_reviews.text: When I I recieved this order the big bottle of olive oil was on top of the boxes of cerial, rice milk, and gummy treats. It looked like someone threw it on top of all my stuff and sealed the box! There was also 2 12 packs of pop in the box that I did not order! They were ed also crushed and coming out of their boxes!!! Very sloppy and disappointed with this shipped box!
customer_reviews.author: laura pichette 💪👻👸👰💇💃👳👥👼👭👭👹👺👺👽👽👲👮🏭💈🏯🏯🏰🏦🏦🏧🏭🏨

customer_reviews.title: These don't taste that good
customer_reviews.text: We ran out of the 80 Welches fruit packs and these just sit there. No one is eating them. I do not recommend. The Welches are much better.
customer_reviews.author: pat B

customer_reviews.title: Stickiness but tasty
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the Kellogg's Fruity snacks before buying these to try. I find the Mott's have a "Stick to your teeth" cnsistency where Kellogg's doesn't. In this way I find them to be substandard, sorry
customer_reviews.author: SnUZuluz

customer_reviews.title: Lost somewhere
customer_reviews.text: My snacks never came. First I got a message saying they would be delivered aug 21st 2020 ( I ordered them Jan 15 2020) and then I got a message they might be lost. So I don’t know how they taste. They were for my grandsons sleepover party
customer_reviews.author: Faiza

customer_reviews.title: good or bad, its mostly sugar
customer_reviews.text: another one of those products that trys to sells as good health, natural ingredients, but they dont show the ingredients. it’s made mostly of sugar, CORN SYRUP, SUGAR. This is good if you want to poison your kids, lol, but if you want good teeths look further... Now i do buy their apple juice and stuff so im not a hater or anything but “it is what it is”
customer_reviews.author: jamie from the jungle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & conveniently packaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids & they love them. It's great they are in small individual serving packs that I can put in my pocket book to give to them & some of the other children at church. These would also make great treats to hand out at our Trunk or Treat activity. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Granny of 3 Cuties

customer_reviews.title: i recommend these fruit snacks to everyone they are really good
customer_reviews.text: what i like about this product is that it comes in family size and its gluten free and its made with fruit puree and real fruit juice they are my favorite. Ive tried the tropical motts fruit snacks and those were good. it came on time today thankyou for dropping it off im very happy with my new fruit snacks
customer_reviews.author: christa wiswesser

customer_reviews.title: Physically Unpleasant
customer_reviews.text: Forget about going to a dentist and getting a crown. Just chew one of these if you need something to completely cover your teeth. It’s not chewy in a fun way. Every bite sticks to your teeth, both in between them and on the surfaces, defying gravity. The fact that the packages were impossible to open, I’ll forgive. That one of the “fruit” is carrot shaped, that confuses me, but I’ll move on. The consistency and texture of these though? I never write reviews. That’s how much I hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: We use these as rewards for our three year old . Some of the reviews that other ppl left about them are kind of silly . Obviously these are not “healthy “ but I don’t think most people would serve these as a healthy snack in place of real fruits or vegetables lol. 🤦🏻‍♀️ They are tasty and like any other fruit snack for kids .
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ambrozic

customer_reviews.title: Holy sugar / barely any veggies
customer_reviews.text: Beware: Corn syrup is first ingredient, followed by sugar. Sweet potato juice is the only veggie juice ingredient I can find. I want to say these are different from what I buy at the grocery store, but it could be that Mott's changed their formula.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: There's Better In This Product Line
customer_reviews.text: Much prefer the other major competitors flavor. Same .oz per package, but these seem smaller probably because individual candies are larger. I will return to the other for future purchases. Okay all around.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great size for great price
customer_reviews.text: The family size box is priced right under what I can buy it at my local grocery store and it's delivered right to my door without me having to carrying it in with the rest of the groceries. I've purchased this item multiple times here on this site and not once has the product been anything less then perfect. One time the box came a little smashed but none of the packages inside were damaged. The fruit snacks are never melted and are equal quality as in my local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Shellea'

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best snacks ever. I have purchased this so many times and will continue to do so, the entire family loves them. The best thing for me is that it’s so much better than buying the smaller boxes at the grocery store- more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: SMiller

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: True story: I used to believe all fruit snacks were pretty much created equal... and then I ordered 3 boxes of these. No kidding, I ate one packet & tossed the rest. The texture & flavor was off-putting.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These candies have a nice fruit flavor, not too sweet. I like the individual packets, good for keeping in your pocket or purse and helps put a brake on over indulgence. Good price, lots of candy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, just the right size for a snack and so fresh and fruity delicious, grand kids and grandma enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette J. Faber

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are starting to add the fruit back into fruit snacks. Still have aways to go but we are all on this journey together and for the value and taste I give these 5 stars. They do not have that artificial taste and good consistency. I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and Amount per package
customer_reviews.text: We love these and this huge box is so convenient. We use these for our type 1 diabetic sons low blood sugars and it raises him quite a bit, perfect for on the go. This huge box seems like it’s never going to run out!
customer_reviews.author: N Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these fruit snacks. They have a real nice fruity taste. The packs are kinda small but they are the same size as other fruit snacks. My grandson ends up eating a couple packs at a time. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite brand of fruit snack. Thought I would try buying them online this time around. Every package we have opened so far are half melted together. They still taste fine, but it is more of a giant fruit snack than individual pieces. I attribute this to Amazon storing and shipping, probably not a Motts problem.
customer_reviews.author: akrupa312

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I like that motts fruit snacks are made with real ingredients. I bought these for my family as a healthy snack option. And I like that they are portioned out because they are do good it wouldn't be hard to keep eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not great
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, Motts fruit snacks are good, but not great. Was expecting more flavor, they're a little bland. They're fresh, good chew, and good price. I got the Assorted Fruit flavor. I thought I remembered more flavor, and more actual fruit in these when I had them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Mott's Medleys Assorted Fruit Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great surprise snack for grandchildren living in different state during pandemic. Tastes good, fruity flavors, small individual packages, inexpensive. Kids love this snack.
customer_reviews.author: Dickki

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite fruit snacks and the only ones I will eat. I use these as a quick snack on the go or when I'm craving something sweet. Great flavor and my sisters love them as well (they are kids)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Gerena

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky, they just want to stick our teeth
customer_reviews.text: Gummies are very mushy and stick to our teeth. Not sure if we just got a dud or this is usual but I don’t like the stickiness of these gummies. Never had any that were sticky this these. Flavor is good though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween but too yummy for year round buying lol
customer_reviews.text: These were too yummy. I bought three boxes for Halloween and the kids LOVED them. And I loved giving them something with vitamin C! However, I liked them too, and it wrecked my diet, so the kids are getting stale popcorn next year. 😜
customer_reviews.author: The Good Wife

customer_reviews.title: TOO Sticky
customer_reviews.text: These are not easy to eat. They are very sticky once in your mouth and stick to your teeth, which makes the experience distressing. The flavor is pretty good - I like the taste. I will not be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shevlin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gummies
customer_reviews.text: These are my kids favorite fruit snacks! They love every flavor and portion size is perfect. The box came a little beat up, but the kids didn't mind that they wanted what was inside the box! would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Artificial
customer_reviews.text: These taste artificial and my kids don't want them after the first pack. Proud of them for being discerning though! Picky runs in my blood and I'm opting for not these again. Sorry, Mott's.
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE FLEURY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I buy these "treats" for the neighbor kid, who likes to trick or treat for snacks on a daily bases. They are a great deal for 40 packages and the taste is yummy. The portion size is perfect for a child. I will continue to purchase until my little one outgrows his visits for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: Might be our favorite brand of dummies, these things are tasty and actually have flavor to them. Not to mention the convince of getting them online. a+++
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wrona

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good product. I was afraid the gummies would taste weird considering this product was coming from a warehouse, but they taste delicious just as fresh as over the counter at the grocery store. The box did come in ripped on the corner, no big deal. We were after the gummies and not the box. Great value for the price! Usually a 10pk from the store is $2.50.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first based on some reviews but for the price I figured I’d take a gamble and WOW, I’m so glad I did cuz it’s a hell of a bargain! My box is 10 months from expiration, Best By: Feb/2020 and I think that’s great beings they won’t even last 2 weeks in my house!
customer_reviews.author: sÿsterwick

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite
customer_reviews.text: It is so much cheaper to order these then to buy in a store. I have 4 kids. 1 doesn't like fruit snacks. 1 loves them so much and the other 2 will eat them but not crave them. This box will last a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but get too sticky and get stuck in your teeth
customer_reviews.text: These fruit snacks are cheap, but in my opinion, they are not worth it. They are way too sticky and get stuck in your teeth way too much. I would recommend buying different fruit snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: . The gooey/ teeth clinger type.
customer_reviews.text: These are the super chewy/gooey kind. Similar to dots . Don’t dissipate easily , get stuck and lingers in teeth . Too much jaw n tongue work , Not a fan. But still good Just not a fan of the gooey teeth clinger type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Platinum Member

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting snacks, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the amount of snacks you get. Very good tasting, good snack.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Favorite Snack
customer_reviews.text: I’m ashamed to say how many fruit snacks my two boys go through 🤦‍♀️ But hey these at least have real fruit juice so that adds a little nutrition right? Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney

customer_reviews.title: BEST FRUITSNACKS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat fruit snacks often...but when I do...it's these ones! They are the best. I could eat several packs in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best fruit snacks and they are 1/2 the price on amazon! The grocery store only carries the 20 pack value size for $6. I’ll be getting them here from now on!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Box opened
customer_reviews.text: soooo box was opened. We counted and long and behold its 39 packs, see picture, someone in store room was hungry and thought we wouldn't notice lol
customer_reviews.author: Tht.u.shld.knw

customer_reviews.title: Sweet gummies
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have real fruit and vegetable juices and no preservatives or artificial junk in them. The pouches provide a cure to my sweet tooth without making me feel too guilty. There are 40 pouches in the jumbo sized box so that I can have some and the kids can take them to school. It's win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Hood

customer_reviews.title: Softer texture than Welch's!
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than Welch's. The issue I have with these is they have vegetable juice in these. Sometimes, that leaves a bad taste in mouth. Ask in all, I'd recommend! I like the fact that Welch has all fruit juice, but I like Mott's texture better.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: picture is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: picture and description state "medleys" which is what I wanted they sent assorted. I reached out and they sent new item...but it was the same thing. I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Assorted Fruit Gluten Free Snacks, Family Size.
customer_reviews.text: Assorted Fruit Gluten-Free Snacks, Family Size. This family size of fruit snacks was just the kids needed. In fact they liked it so much I ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Donia G. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful and best texture ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these fruit snacks, they are always my favorite! I got them on a great deal! I could eat the whole box in one sitting. They have great flavor, and the texture is better than any fruit snacks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Box was not damaged. No strange or moldy packs of fruit snacks in my shipment. Someone complained these stick to your teeth and that is true — like the consistency of Gushers, but I don’t mind. They’re delicious.
customer_reviews.author: V. Balz

customer_reviews.title: Squishy Goodness
customer_reviews.text: These are probably by far my favorite fruit snacks for my whole family. This box has 40 pouches with about 7 or 8 pieces in them. My kids really enjoy them as a snack between meals. They are not sticky on your fingers and they are not overly chewy. They taste great to me and my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Corby

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: One star based on wrong item would be 5 star if it was the Motts Medleys -I Ordered The medleys but received the assorted fruit ones 😡 can’t return and kids will not eat!
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: flavor ok
customer_reviews.text: Seeing that these snacks were coming from Mott's I was disappointed in the flavor not very strong plus seemed like some sort of dry coasting on the outside
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Miller

product_meta.title: Mott's Medleys Fruit Snacks, Gluten Free, Family Size, 40 Pouches, 0.8 oz
product_meta.description:
Mott’s Medleys Fruit Flavored Snacks bring you and your kids the best of both worlds. Your kids will love the fruity flavors, and you’ll love that each fruit gummy is made with natural flavors and colors from natural sources. Mott’s Medleys contain no gelatin or gluten, 0% saturated fat per pouch and only 80 calories per pouch, plus a full day’s worth of vitamin C so you and your kids can enjoy this tasty treat.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :7.75 x 3.75 x 9.13 inches; 2.3 Pounds
 * Date First Available :June 9, 2015
 * Manufacturer :General Mills
 * ASIN :B00Z9YV15A

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars10,859 ratings Mott’s Medleys Fruit Flavored Snacks bring you and your kids the best of both worlds. Your kids will love the fruity flavors, and you’ll love that each fruit gummy is made with natural flavors and colors from natural sources. Mott’s Medleys contain no gelatin or gluten, 0% saturated fat per pouch and only 80 calories per pouch, plus a full day’s worth of vitamin C so you and your kids can enjoy this tasty treat.
feature_bullets: NATURALLY FLAVORED: Gummy treats made with real fruit and veggie juice*, no artificial flavors and no colors from artificial sources
WHOLESOME: A tasty snack that is fat free with 100% Daily Value Vitamin C
VARIETY SNACK PACKS: Fruit pouches in your favorite fruit shapes; the perfect snacks for kids
ON-THE-GO SNACK: 80 calories per pouch, these individual snacks are an easy addition to any day out
BOX CONTAINS: Bulk snacks; 1 box, 40 total pouches of variety snacks
